resources.string:
SELECT 
 (select waretypename from sawaretype where rtrim(sawaretype.[waretypeid]) = rtrim(sawarecode.[waretypeid])) waretypename, 
 (select count(warecode) from sawarecode b where rtrim(b.id) = rtrim(sawarecode.[id])) ware_all, 
 count(distinct saindent.[warecode]) ware_cnt, 
 sum(saindent.[warenum]) ware_num, 
 sum(sawarecode.[retailprice]*saindent.[warenum]) price 
 from sawarecode 
 left join saindent 
 on rtrim(sawarecode.warecode) = rtrim(saindent.warecode) 
 group by sawarecode.[waretypeid]
select count(distinct warecode) ware_cnt from sawarecode
select sum(sawarecode.[retailprice]*saindent.[warenum]) price from saindent, sawarecode where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode
